com.riskgame.strategy

Interface PlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, Human, RandomPlayer

    public interface PlayerStrategy
    Player Strategy definitions to be used by all the types of players.
    Author:
    Anusha

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allOutAttack(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry)
      All out attack mode where the attack happens with the maximum number of dice that the player gets based on the number of armies present in his attacking country
      void attackPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attacker, Country defender)
      Attack phase where the attacker chooses the number of dice to roll(for human player implementation only)
      void fortificationPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country fromCountry, Country toCountry, int armiesCount)
      Fortifying armies from one country to its adjacent country, both of which are owned by the player
      void placeArmies(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player, Country country)
      Place armies method that should implement the logic of allocating the armies from playerController.armiesAssignedToCountries() method
      void reinforcementPhase(Player player, GameMapGraph mapGraph, Country country, int reinforceArmyCount)
      Reinforcement of armies to the player owned countries

    • Method Detail

      • placeArmies

        void placeArmies(GameMapGraph mapGraph,
                 Player player,
                 Country country)
        Place armies method that should implement the logic of allocating the armies from playerController.armiesAssignedToCountries() method
        Parameters:
        mapGraph - - The object of the GameMapGraph
        country - - The object of the country
        player - - The object of the player

        void reinforcementPhase(Player player,
                        GameMapGraph mapGraph,
                        Country country,
                        int reinforceArmyCount)
        Reinforcement of armies to the player owned countries
        Parameters:
        player - - The object of the player
        mapGraph - - The object of the GamemapGraph
        country - - The object of the Country
        reinforceArmyCount - - The number of armies for reinforcement

                 Player player,
                 Country attacker,
                 Country defender)

        defender - - The defender country

      • allOutAttack

        void allOutAttack(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph,
                  Player player,
                  Country attackerCountry,
                  Country defenderCountry)
        All out attack mode where the attack happens with the maximum number of dice that the player gets based on the number of armies present in his attacking country
        Parameters:
        gameMapGraph - - The object of the GameMapGraph
        attackerCountry - - The attacker country
        defenderCountry - - The defender country
        player - - The object of the player

      • fortificationPhase

        void fortificationPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph,
                        Player player,
                        Country fromCountry,
                        Country toCountry,
                        int armiesCount)
        Fortifying armies from one country to its adjacent country, both of which are owned by the player
        Parameters:
        fromCountry - - The country to move armies from
        toCountry - - The country to move armies to
        armiesCount - - Number of armies for fortification
        gameMapGraph - - The object of the GameMapgraph
        player - - The object of the player
